About Company

Setting The Benchmark in Heat Transfer Technology

Salama Engineering Industries is a leading company specialized in the manfacturing of heat transfer equipment and being the sole agent of TRANTER (Global) Plate Heat Exchanger in KSA. Based in Dammam, we have over two decades of commitment and reliability to markets that require superior product solutions.

Modern and sophisticated engineering workshops along with our highly qualified technicians represent the finest in engineering crops. One is in fabrication and coating of HVAC-R coils while the other is in manufacturing and servicing of process heat exchanges.

Here at Salama Engineering Industries we respond to a broad range of industrial requirements through full service engineering including basic engineering down to detailed engineering of systems.

Milestones towards Success

2002

Started Fabrication of HVAC/R coils, Calorifiers Tanks & small Heat Exchangers

2013

Up gradation of Workshop Facility

2017

ASME U.S.R & NB Certification and increase the capability for big shell and tuhe HE

2019

Development of Facility for PTHE & Collaborate with TRANTER as a Technical Partners for PTHE

2022

Up grade new facility 15000 SQM in 2nd and industrial city

2024

Up grade new facility 15000 SQM in 2nd and industrial city

Why Us

Unmatched Expertise, Innovation, and Reliability

History and Background
Mission & Vision
Values
History and Background

History and Background

SALAMA Engineering has been a leading engineering service provider for over two and a half decades offering innovative heat transfer solutions for the Oil & Gas, Petrochemical, and HVAC sectors. Originally founded in Dammam, KSA, we have evolved into a complex company with vertically-integrated production facilities. Thus, we are committed to quality and innovation, equipped to serve a broad client base, and have partnered with globally renowned companies like Tranter.

Key Achievements:

  • Established: Over 20 years ago
  • Served: Oil & Gas, Petrochemical and HVAC sectors.
  • Expanded operations across: KSA
  • Sole agent for: Tranter Global PHE in KSA
Mission & Vision

Mission and Vision

Our Vision: To Be A Trusted & Leading Market Player In The Businesses That We Choose To Compete With, Saudi Arabia

Our Mission: We Will Accomplish Our Vision With Speed And Commitment Driven By Talented People And Innovative Culture

Values

Our Values

Integrity

DOING THE RIGHT THINGS, THE RIGHT WAY
We always be positive and maintain high standards of our work and behavior, treating people with respect, escalate the matter if it is the right thing to do.

Ownership

TAKING CHARGE WITHOUT BEING ASKED
We will always offer solutions proactively, speak up on what is important for the company, we take charge instead of complaining

Agility

MOVING WITH URGENCY & FOCUS
We always demonstrate urgency with speed, being adaptive to transformational changes. and simplify processes to drive results.

Empowerment

AUTHORITY WITH ACCOUNTABILITY
We will always share relevant information to empower people.and give and receive feedback, We look at avenues to leverage technology.

Customer Delight

KNOWING WHAT TO FOCUS ON
We will always try to find a better way, anticipating needs and issues, with highly responsive towards our stakeholders.

Our Certification

Salama stands out as the leading engineering solution provider for providing high-performing and durable products, holding certifications from leading organizations.
